ch0034_10_matsurika/0101_0701_02_10:
Seeing you smile makes me feel like I can paint
my next masterpiece today!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7101_0701_01_10: This sygna suit makes me feel brand new!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7101_0701_02_10:
I’ve gotta decide things properly, like the captain
I am!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7101_0701_03_10: The new and improved Mina is at your service!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7102_0701_01_10:
I wonder how I can deliver the beautiful colors of
Pasio to others...
ch0034_10_matsurika/7102_0701_02_10:
Maybe I could turn some of my paintings into
postcards and hand them out?
ch0034_10_matsurika/7103_0701_01_10:
With this sygna suit that matches Tapu Fini, I’m
feeling so amped up!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7103_0701_02_10:
Ohhh, I’ve got an idea! What if instead of painting
on paper or canvas, I painted on a shirt!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7103_0701_03_10: That would be new and interesting!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7104_0701_01_10:
Tapu Fini can create pure water that washes
away any uncleanness.
ch0034_10_matsurika/7104_0701_02_10:
It’s a special kind of water that can soothe your
mind and body.
ch0034_10_matsurika/7104_0701_03_10: I hope my paintings have the same effect.
ch0034_10_matsurika/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m so inspired every time I see you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0034_10_matsurika/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m sure it’s because your personality has
colors no others have!
ch0034_10_matsurika/1701_0701_01_10: Oooh, good timing! I’ve got a nice present for you.
ch0034_10_matsurika/1701_0702_01_10: It’s small, but I figure you’ll need it.
ch0034_10_matsurika/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m all about that seafaring life. I’ve sailed and
seen all sorts of oceans.
ch0034_10_matsurika/2501_0701_02_10:
The ocean can be calm or rough—sometimes
even lonely...
ch0034_10_matsurika/2501_0701_03_10: The ocean has its moods, and I love painting them!
ch0034_10_matsurika/2501_0702_01_10: If you’ve ever the chance to see different oceans...
ch0034_10_matsurika/2501_0702_02_10: I hope you’ll tell me when you find your favorite!
ch0034_10_matsurika/2511_0701_01_10:
Landscapes are great, but drawing people is
fun, too!
ch0034_10_matsurika/2511_0701_02_10:
One day, you should let me paint the colors unique
to you, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0034_10_matsurika/2511_0702_02_10:
Drawing is fun and all, but BEING drawn is
fun, too.
ch0034_10_matsurika/2511_0702_03_10:
I wonder what colors you see in me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0034_10_matsurika/3001_0701_01_10:
Come on! There’re sights we can only see at this
time of day... Let’s go find them!
ch0034_10_matsurika/3003_0701_01_10:
You’ll see all sorts of people walking around
town. Even that would make a neat painting.
ch0034_10_matsurika/3005_0701_01_10:
Phew, I’m kinda tired. Let’s get some rest before
we burn out, ’kay?
